DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , single-arm , multi-center registry study A total 50 subject Type B aortic dissection meet inclusion exclusion criterion include . Patients treat TEVAR use conformable TAG endograft ( Gore ) . Patients follow clinically 12 month procedure . CT perform 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: Korean Registry Thoracic Endovascular Aortic Repair Timing Type B Aortic Dissection ( K-TEAM Study ) : A Prospective Multicenter Registry
DOC.criteria: 1. ) In case acute Type B dissection ( 14 day first dissection ) Maximum aortic diameter > 40 mm Increase aortic diameter > 2 mm baseline b ) In case subacute ( 15~90 day ) chronic ( 90 day ~ 1 year ) Type B Maximum aortic diameter > 55 mm Increase aortic diameter > 4 mm baseline 2 . Age 1980 year . 3 . Aorta anatomy appropriate stent graft therapy , 1 . Proximal land zone ( diameter 23 42 mm ) aneurysmal , dissect significantly thrombose . 2 . Proximal land zone length > 20 mm ( length leave subclavian artery origin primary intima tear length leave common carotid artery origin primary intima tear leave subclavian artery embolized possibly revascularized ) , measure outer curve aorta . 4 . Declaration voluntary participation study sign informed consent form . 1 . Endorgan ischemia evidence malperfusion due aortic dissection 2 . Aortic rupture impede rupture due aortic dissection 3 . Renal dysfunction serum Cr level > 2.0 mg/dL 4 . Marfan syndrome , LoeysDiets , EhlersDanlos syndrome , connective tissue diseases 5 . Uncontrolled active infection active vasculitis . 6 . Recent myocardial infarction cerebrovascular accident within 4 week prior study enrollment . 7 . Previous thoracic aorta surgery stentgraft implantation 8 . Planned concomitant surgical procedure ( left subclavian artery transposition bypass ) major surgery within 30 day study enrolment . 9 . Women positive pregnancy test child bear age 10 . Life expectancy < 1 year due comorbidity
